input_refs.source_verbatim: Upon Zebracorp’s request the Parties shall agree upon a Statement of Work, a template of which has been attached to this Agreement as Appendix “Statement of Work (SoW)”.
Any payments to be made for the Licensed Products, the Services and the rights and licenses granted hereunder are exclusively set out in the Products Appendix
The Supplier shall not be liable for damages under this Clause Product Liability to the extent arising from the use of the Licensed Products or the SaaS outside the Documentation .

The Supplier agrees that it shall provide Zebracorp the following data and information on the products: (i) US Export Control Classification Number (ECCN), if subject to the US Export Administration Regulations (EAR), (ii) EU ECCN, if listed in the Wassenaar List of Dual-Use Goods and Technologies, (iii) method of classification (self-classified or classified by the U.S. Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS)), (iv) CCATS number and CCATS document issued by the BIS (if available), (v) the French “Autorisation d’Exportation de Moyen de Cryptologie” (if available), (vi) Schedule B and HS code and (vii) country of origin ((i) through (vii) hereinafter collectively referred to as the “ECC Data”).

Where, under this Agreement, Supplier provides Services to Zebracorp or Customers, and Supplier’s access to personal data, in providing these Services, cannot be definitely excluded or is within the scope of the Agreement, the Parties shall execute and attach a Data Protection Appendix (“DPA”) to this Agreement, and Supplier shall process such personal data solely in accordance with the DPA, this Agreement and Zebracorp’s instructions.
This appendix is attached to and forms a part of the Agreement
The prices for the Services under this MSA are stated in Annex PPT hereto or in the Product Appendix of the Agreement.

Without prejudice to Supplier’s obligation to strictly comply with the security requirements set forth in the Product Security Requirements Appendix, Supplier shall make the Software easy to maintain.
The regulations of Quality Assurance Appendix to the Agreement shall apply to Supplier’s performance of Services.
